pr_title: Block Tap/Touch Gesture when hint/linked clicked

timeline.message:
NF: Extract executeTouchCommand

To be extended in next commit

Allow click of link/hint to stop touch gesture

User request - allow clicking a link to click the link without
activating the touch gestures. Also works for hints.

Fixes #6141

timeline.bodyText: Is it worth noting that it may slow the gesture system down a lot? (any idea how much?)
